title: Snappy
description: Draw picture diary for everyday moments special

concept.title: One photo, infinite emotions
concept.description: Upload your photo or write a diary and let AI turn them into a picture with various styles

strengths.title: Capture your moments, Snappy will make them extraordinary
strengths.description: Record your precious daily moments with AI styling, and check your diary and photos at a glance.

first.title: Make your memories shine brighter with AI-powered photo styling
first.description: Capture the moment you want to remember, choose a style, and let AI make it special.

second.title:
Write it down,
Snappy's AI turn them into a beautiful picture diary
second.description: Write your daily diary and emotions, and AI will create a picture diary for you.

third.title: See all your days at a glance
third.description: View all your days in one place, displayed in card or calendar format.

subscription.title: Enhance Your Memories with Pro Features
subscription.description: Make special moments even more extraordinary with unlimited AI styling

free.name: Free
free.description: For beginners to explore our service and start your journey

pro-monthly.name: Pro (Monthly)
pro-monthly.description: For active users to enjoy unlimited AI styling

pro-yearly.name: Pro (Yearly)
pro-yearly.description: For long-term users to save more with annual payment

get-started.title: Start your moment with Snappy
get-started.description: Preorder now to enjoy a discounted rate of $4.99 per month.
get-started.description2: Limited quantities available, so reserve quickly!
